column1: ### Pattern for this file is as follows:
###     - type has to be BUG or IMPROVEMENT
###     - authors are comma separated values - name and surname

column2: In Outputlabel and InputText developer can provide body as value for component
Added new attribute called 'rowStylesMap' for table definition in XML that allows to set rows colors displayed in Table
Implemented multi selection of table rows. By using CTRL key for rows selection it is possible to select multiple rows
Configured support for internationalization (i18n). Support for translating validation messages
Implemented events queueing and application blockade
Handled and prepared suitable mask for e-mail validation

column1: Reduced login and registration window size
column2: Reduced login and registration window size to be correctly displayed on low resolution screens
Provided ability to define dates collection and date range disabled for selection from calendar
Prepared display window containing application version - like repository's branch URL, svn checkout version and build timestamp
Calendar handling displaying several types of collections
Table that allows for grouping data
column6: Adam Zaręba, Piotr Gmyz, Kamil Trusiak

column1: Steering of menu tree elements visibility
column2: Mechanism that allows during application startup define application mode. Based on that application mode it is possible to define which left menu tree elements are visible or hidden
